p: Furthermore, no significant differences of BUN were detected between the study groups on the first day, as well as between the groups that used 100 and 200 mg/kg of PO in the other six days ( Figure 15). The findings further revealed that the group that used 100 and 200 (mg/kg) of the PO had lower creatinine and they did not have a significant difference compare to two other groups. The control group had the highest amount of creatinine ( Figure 16).
